title: PLEASE HELP ME WITH INTERNET SPEEDS
body: So I recently moved to a farm in Saskatewan, Canada near Saskatoon. I have 13/mbs download and around 6.6/mbs upload. When I play league (or try to) I have about 670 ping consistent. Please help I have been playing this game for years now and I really can't just quit. PLEASE HELP ME.

replies.body: Let's do a little troubleshooting really quickly just to make sure your network is properly configured before we dig too much deeper. Check out your network settings using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource, but do make sure to do those steps on port forwarding and configuring your DNS settings. Let me know if that's able to help or not!
Okay so I got the hextech repair tool but it appears at the top of my screen and I cannot move it.

Run through the steps in this guide that I linked -> [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

The steps in there should be able to help. The Hextech Repair Tool isn't going to be much help with this issue.
I ran through each step and still hover at around 620ms. I am not sure if it is my provider or if it is my location but I did run through the steps to no avail.

Thankfully I have a way of testing that as well ^_^!

Grab a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a trace to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1. Paste what it gives you back for me to take a look at how good your connection looks as it travels to our servers.
It only gives me windows options, sorry I must've forgot to say that I am on mac/apple sorry.
Ahhhhhhh macs, that's alright. [**PingPlotter **](https://www.pingplotter.com/)is another good tool to do traceroutes on Macs so give that one a shot!
okay i let the program run for awhile and now how do you see it? or how do i send it to you?
